title: Cassiopeia
body: I've had a few games with the rework, and overall she just seems lackluster. The W is NOT reliable enough to use. I've had an akali walk backwards from the W, and jump OVER it. I just want to get others thoughts on her, do you think she is weak at the moment or do you like her?

replies.body:
Her W can be insane in some big chunky team fights.
Her duelling is weaker but her team fight potential with the Massive Poison radius and AOE stun makes her a big late game threat
